page.title: 08Hotels
page.content: { Forest Gardens Hotel}has 16 rooms, many have bath/shower.The{Waterloo {Arms}was three cottages about 300 years old.{The Swan Inn}is over 200 years old. It has it's own ghost, a tall man who appears in bedrooms and moves objects . It is thought to be a landlord who shot himself.{The Fox and {Hounds}was a coaching inn on the route from Southampton to Bournemouth The inn dates back to the 16C.{The {Lyndhurst Park Hotel}has had a rich and varied life since it was built as a private home in 1850 before becoming a hotel in 1900.{Evergreen's}is a country hotel with a garden, and swimming pool.{The New Forest Inn}was started in the 1700's by building round a caravan which stood on the site.{The Crown}privately owned has 42 bedrooms with bath tv & tea.{All the {hotels and pubs are most interesting.
